mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cinema( cinema_no, cinema_name, cinema_address, cinema_seat_count, cinema_status, cinema_begin_date, cinema_finish_date ) values( seq_cinema_no.nextval, #{cinema_name}, #{cinema_address}, #{cinema_seat_count}, #{cinema_status, jdbcType=varchar}, #{cinema_begin_date, jdbcType=varchar}, #{cinema_finish_date, jdbcType=varchar} )
